author: Alpha-232
comment: Yes, you can join external competitions and ask your care person to help you record it in the SEAL system.

author: Accomplished_Desk177
comment: My experience is I got my service and enrichment by just joining events. From year 2.

author: calimato
comment: Cann, take part in other cca’s one time events. or volunteering programmes. Some talks and programmes are made compulsory (attendance) by your lecturers, so make sure you attend for the easy seal points
